abstract: The pharmaceutical company’s earnings beat expectations, however, helped by sales of the diabetes drug Januvia and revenue in emerging markets.
snippet: The pharmaceutical company’s earnings beat expectations, however, helped by sales of the diabetes drug Januvia and revenue in emerging markets.
lead_paragraph: The drug maker Merck said revenue dropped by 4 percent in the third quarter as sales of its vaccine for cervical cancer fell and other drugs encountered increased competition from generics. Still, the company’s earnings, reported Monday, beat analysts’ expectations.

headline.main: Merck Sales Down 4%; Profit Beats Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Merck Sales Down 4%; Profit Beats Forecasts
